page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Wake up- very tired.Wash hands and face,clean teeth,Get dressed - in struggle.Go downstairs- Dog whines.Eat cereal,watch T.V.AM.Get shoes on;dog tries to chew laces.Meet Sue and Dave on way to school then start running away from sister.School at last.Bell rings.Teacher calls Registerloudly and clearly, then swimming list.Girl made to sit by me.Assembly then Maths.Now Writing about a Day in my Life.Play bell rings.Susan and I play with Claire and Amanda.After play teacher helps groups with Time game.I do some time work.Dinner bell rings.I had crisps, sandwiches,Biscuits and a drink. Teacher talks about Saxon Witham. Play again .Go to Bramston in mini bus for swimming .On back with arm bands.Home for salad tea. Go to Cubs with Darren. I've got 3 badges. Play game.Go home and to BED.
